short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Single click the icon to play/pause the leftmost YouTube tab, double click to skip. The icon shows elapsed time and video length.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple, quick control for a YouTube tab.

This extension is designed as a fast, one-click way to pause a YouTube video. There is no popup, it just pauses the leftmost YouTube tab when you click the icon. You can also double click to skip to the next video.

The icon shows the current minutes into the video over the total video length.

Right click and go to "Options" to change the color 

Please comment with suggestions / problems.

The code is available at https://github.com/mdzirbel/YouTube-Extension
